post.body: yeah. right. cuz no one else has ever worn a lab coat like that.
I hear by the fire is quite delightful....
I'm really impressed Jeff! Don't tell mom though. She'll want to know why you didn't do better on your SATs, which seem easier!
Wow! Didn't realize it was at Zellerbach! What a huge deal!
That's okay!
Yeah, what's the point of that?
I didn't know you still cared!!
Yup. Things are a little uncertain around work at the moment, so he's keeping his options open.
Pics! http://www.leyser.org/TeeBlog/?p=503
My cold seems to have gone. That was quick!
Yes. Its a cold. Kill me now. There is *nothing* I can take.
Sneezing a lot. I hope it isn't a cold for Christmas.
And the latest number on the hit parade...heartburn!!
Darn. Only works one direction! Big bro is suppose to be working on it. @jleyser how's it going?
Testing blog link.
Ahh, coffee is good again!!
PSA: http://rleyser.livejournal.com/447955.html
Is back at work, but still nauseous and tired. And burping. Aren't you glad you know all of that?
Is tired.
Burping. That's what I am doing. Ever 5 seconds. Have I mentioned how much I am enjoying this pregnancy thing?
